attributes.action: Ban meat slaughtered Halal style within the UK.
attributes.additional_details: It is a cruel and barbaric way of slaughtering animals
attributes.background: Ban meat prepared in the way of Halal within the UK. Slaughtered either here in the UK or abroad.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700557
